Package nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.tooluser.creator

Class Creator

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.tooluser.ToolUser
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.tooluser.creator.Creator
Direct Known Subclasses:
CreatorBigDoor, CreatorClock, CreatorDrawbridge, CreatorFlag, CreatorGarageDoor, CreatorPortcullis, CreatorSlidingDoor, CreatorWindMill
public abstract class Creator extends ToolUser
Represents a specialization of the ToolUser that is used for creating new AbstractDoors.
Author:
Pim

  • Nested Class Summary

    • name

      @Nullable protected @Nullable String name
      The name of the door that is to be created.

    • cuboid

      @Nullable protected @Nullable Cuboid cuboid
      The cuboid that defines the location and dimensions of the door.

      This region is defined by firstPos and the second position selected by the user.

    • firstPos

      @Nullable protected @Nullable Vector3Di firstPos
      The first point that was selected in the process.

      Once a second point has been selected, these two are used to construct the cuboid.

    • rotationPoint

      @Nullable protected @Nullable Vector3Di rotationPoint
      The position of the rotation point selected by the user.

    • powerblock

      @Nullable protected @Nullable Vector3Di powerblock
      The powerblock selected by the user.

    • openDir

      @Nullable protected @Nullable RotateDirection openDir
      The opening direction selected by the user.

    • world

      @Nullable protected @Nullable IPWorld world
      The IPWorld this door is created in.

      protected boolean isOpen
      Whether the door is created in the open (true) or closed (false) position.

      protected boolean isLocked
      Whether the door is created in the locked (true) or unlocked (false) state.

      IFactory for the IStep that sets the name.

      Don't forget to set the message before using it!

      Don't forget to set the message before using it!

      Don't forget to set the message before using it!

      Don't forget to set the message before using it!

    • factoryConfirmPrice

      protected Step.Factory factoryConfirmPrice
      IFactory for the IStep that allows the player to confirm or reject the price of the door.

      Don't forget to set the message before using it!

    • factoryCompleteProcess

      protected Step.Factory factoryCompleteProcess
      IFactory for the IStep that completes this process.

      Don't forget to set the message before using it!

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • init

      protected void init()
      Description copied from class: ToolUser
      Basic initialization executed at the start of the constructor.
      Specified by:
      init in class ToolUser

    • constructDoorData

      protected final DoorBase constructDoorData()
      Constructs the DoorBase for the current door. This is the same for all doors.
      Returns:
      The DoorBase for the current door.

    • completeCreationProcess

      protected boolean completeCreationProcess()
      Completes the creation process. It'll construct and insert the door and complete the ToolUser process.
      Returns:
      True, so that it fits the functional interface being used for the steps.

      If the insertion fails for whatever reason, it'll just be ignored, because at that point, there's no sense in continuing the creation process anyway.

    • giveTool

      protected abstract void giveTool()
      Method used to give the BigDoors tool to the user.

      Overriding methods may call ToolUser.giveTool(String, String, String).

    • completeNamingStep

      protected boolean completeNamingStep(String str)
      Completes the naming step for this Creator. This means that it'll set the name, go to the next step, and give the user the creator tool.

      Note that there are some requirements that the name must meet. See Util.isValidDoorName(String).

      Parameters:
      str - The desired name of the door.
      Returns:
      True if the naming step was finished successfully.

    • setFirstPos

      protected boolean setFirstPos(IPLocation loc)
      Sets the first location of the selection and advances the procedure if successful.
      Parameters:
      loc - The first location of the cuboid.
      Returns:
      True if setting the location was successful.

    • setSecondPos

      protected boolean setSecondPos(IPLocation loc)
      Sets the second location of the selection and advances the procedure if successful.
      Parameters:
      loc - The second location of the cuboid.
      Returns:
      True if setting the location was successful.

    • confirmPrice

      protected boolean confirmPrice(boolean confirm)
      Attempts to buy the door for the player and advances the procedure if successful.

      Note that if the player does not end up buying the door, either because of insufficient funds or because they rejected the offer, the current step is NOT advanced!

      Parameters:
      confirm - Whether the player confirmed they want to buy this door.
      Returns:
      Always returns true, because either they can and do buy the door, or they cannot or refuse to buy the door and the process is aborted.

    • parseOpenDirection

      protected Optional<RotateDirection> parseOpenDirection(String str)
      Parses the selected open direction from a String.

      If the String is an integer value, it will try to get the RotateDirection at the corresponding index in the list of valid open directions as obtained from DoorType#getValidOpenDirections().

      If the String is not an integer value, it will try to match it to the name of a RotateDirection. Note that it has to be an exact match.

      Parameters:
      str - The name or index of the selected open direction.
      Returns:
      The selected RotateDirection, if it exists.

    • completeSetOpenDirStep

      protected boolean completeSetOpenDirStep(String str)
      Attempts to complete the step that sets the openDir. It uses the open direction as parsed from a String using parseOpenDirection(String) if possible.

      If no valid open direction for this type can be found, nothing changes.

      Parameters:
      str - The name or index of the RotateDirection that was selected by the player.
      Returns:
      True if the openDir was set successfully.

    • constructDoor

      protected abstract AbstractDoor constructDoor()
      Constructs the door at the end of the creation process.
      Returns:
      The newly-created door.

    • verifyWorldMatch

      protected boolean verifyWorldMatch(IPWorld targetWorld)
      Verifies that the world of the selected location matches the world that this door is being created in.
      Parameters:
      targetWorld - The world to check.
      Returns:
      True if the world is the same world this door is being created in.

    • insertDoor

      protected void insertDoor(AbstractDoor door)
      Takes care of inserting the door.
      Parameters:
      door - The door to send to the DatabaseManager.

    • getDoorType

      protected abstract DoorType getDoorType()
      Obtains the type of door this creator will create.
      Returns:
      The type of door that will be created.

    • buyDoor

      protected boolean buyDoor()
      Attempts to buy the door for the current player.
      Returns:
      True if the player has bought the door or if the economy is not enabled.

    • getPrice

      protected OptionalDouble getPrice()
      Gets the price of the door based on its volume. If the door is free because the price is <= 0 or the IEconomyManager is disabled, the price will be empty.
      Returns:
      The price of the door if a positive price could be found.

    • skipConfirmPrice

      protected boolean skipConfirmPrice()
      Checks if the step that asks the user to confirm that they want to buy the door should be skipped.

      It should be skipped if the door is free for whatever reason. See getPrice().

      Returns:
      True if the step that asks the user to confirm that they want to buy the door should be skipped.

    • getOpenDirections

      protected String getOpenDirections()
      Gets the list of available open directions for the DoorType that is being created in the following format:

      "idx: RotateDirection\n"

      Returns:
      The list of valid open directions for this type, each on their own line.

    • getValidOpenDirections

      protected List<RotateDirection> getValidOpenDirections()
      Gets the list of valid open directions for this type. It returns a subset of DoorType#getValidOpenDirections() based on the current physical aspects of the AbstractDoor.
      Returns:
      The list of valid open directions for this type given its current physical dimensions.

    • completeSetPowerBlockStep

      protected boolean completeSetPowerBlockStep(IPLocation loc)
      Attempts to complete the step in the Procedure that sets the second position of the AbstractDoor that is being created.
      Parameters:
      loc - The selected location of the rotation point.
      Returns:
      True if the location of the area was set successfully.

    • completeSetRotationPointStep

      protected boolean completeSetRotationPointStep(IPLocation loc)
      Attempts to complete the step in the Procedure that sets the location of the rotation point for the AbstractDoor that is being created.
      Parameters:
      loc - The selected location of the rotation point.
      Returns:
      True if the location of the rotation point was set successfully.
